Commands.Field Burst: Magic BRV attackTarget: High chance Force for 5 turns, creating easier Knock Back
Commands.Energy Gain: Magic BRV attack + HP attackEasier Knock BackSelf: 3 turns MAG ATK Up I
Commands.Gae Bolg: 4-HIT AoE BRV attack + single target HP attack.Moderately raises BRV damage dealt to a single target.Greatly raises BRV damage dealt to targets afflicted with Gravity Down.BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV.Grants Clavat Heart for 5 turns.Initiates a Chase Sequence and allows other targets to be launched immediately.Clavat Heart has the following effects:- Raises all party members' Max BRV and Attack.- Makes it easier to initiate a Chase Sequence for all party members.

Artifacts.Debuff Guard Up: Raises Defense Power by 10% while an enemy is debuffed.
Artifacts.Crystal Bearer Boost: Increases the effects of Crystal Bearer by 5%.
Artifacts.Mighty Field Burst: Raises BRV Damage dealt by Field Burst by 10%.
Artifacts.Mighty Energy Gain: Raises BRV Damage dealt by Energy Gain by 10%.

Passives.Field Burst Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Field Burst.
Passives.Smash Attack Up: Slightly raises Attack for 1 turn after initiating a Chase Sequence.
Passives.Field Burst Charge: Increases the max uses of Field Burst by 1.
Passives.Energy Gain Charge: Increases the max uses of Energy Gain by 1.
Passives.Debuff Attack Up: Slightly raises Attack while an enemy is debuffed.
Passives.Break Bonus Up: Slightly raises Break Bonus earned after breaking an enemy.
Passives.Energy Gain Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Energy Gain.
Passives.BRV Speed Up: Slightly raises Speed when BRV is over 50%.
Passives.Crystal Bearer: Slightly raises Initial BRV, Max BRV, Attack and Defense if HP is Max when the final battle starts.
